item.dc:creator: @manny458 manny458
item.description:
@manny458 wrote:

this is my code i have so farpublic void enterZombie() { c.getPA().movePlayer(2777,10085, c.playerId * 4); c.waveId = 0; c.ZombiesToKill = -1; c.ZombiesKilled = -1; EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer e) { Server.zombieMiniGame.spawnNextWave((Client)Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId]); e.stop(); } }, 10000); }
it spawns the first wave of zombies how can i make it so when a certain amount the next wave is spawned please help!

Read full topic
